phrs.translation: 肩翻新, 重新包胶, 回忆
轮胎翻修成型机, 轮胎翻修硫化机

sentences.sentence: I'll start by recapping some basics from the introduction to JiBX in Part 2.
sentences.translation: 一开始我将扼要回顾一下第2部分中JiBX简介的一些基本内容。

sentences.sentence: After choosing the default language to use, you will come to a screen recapping what you will be installing.
sentences.translation: 选择要使用的默认语言之后，屏幕再次显示将安装的东西。

sentences.sentence: Recapping your meeting quickly means that you can address any miscommunication or errors before they're submitted on official documents.
sentences.translation: 快速更新会议评估意味着你可以在他们提交正式文件前解决任何误解或错误。
